channel.title: Modding my Xbox
channel.description:
Im using all my birthday money on moding my Xbox. Its gonna be so PIMP!!!
First off, the mod chip.
I can't chose between these two
Xecuter 3 [img]http://www.xbox-hq.com/html/modules/Xbox_Modchips/images/xecuter3_final.jpg[/img] and Xenium [img]http://www.xbox-hq.com/html/modules/Xbox_Modchips/images/xenium.jpg[/img]
Im probably getting Xecuter since I know many modders who have chosen this as the best chip theyve seen.
Next on the list is the new case!
Clear is da 5H1T [img]http://www.kanection.co.uk/images/xbox/xbox-clear-case-parts.jpg[/img]
Then some LED lights. [img]http://www.extreme-mods.com/images/xlight_grassgreen.jpg[/img] Maybe a little darker green though, Im gonna shape it intoa big X on the top of my case.
CONTROLAS!!! Notice the center is glowing too. Also, all the buttons glow. [img]http://i8.ebayimg.com/02/i/000/8b/2e/4c8a_1_b.JPG[/img]
Im thinking of getting it in either Red or Blue.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Well, I post pics when its completely done. It might bea few more weeks though. Waiting for the shipments to come in. :( That would suck... But sstill, my Xbox is gonna be freakin sweet. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Tell me what you think about this idea, and any color suggestions for the lights or case mods. ( I might change it to what you guys choose ).

item.title: Modding my Xbox
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

Let him learn the hard way. If he has good enough soldiering skills he should be able to pull it off. If you don’t know what I’m talking about, DONT DO IT. Still, go with the blue case, and put some drak blue neon tube on it. I’m doing the same thing to my Xbox but I’m turning it into an Xbox 180. I got a sick ass case for it and built my own OS for it. So yea, good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Modding my Xbox
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

aps, I recommend you don’t mod anything. The post Mopman showed us above somewhat proves you have a 97% of bricking the box and whining about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Modding my Xbox
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

aps:

then I do what most modders are gonna do, swap the proscessors. Der. Cause theres no real good working 360 modchip yet. Theyre mostly beta still.

Err… how exactly are you going to swap a Pentium out and put a PowerPC 3-core in its place? You livin’ in dreamland.

Read full topic

item.title: Modding my Xbox
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

[quote=“wonderguy6, post:10, topic:58714”][quote author=aps link=topic=84101.msg903352#msg903352 date=1171553958]
=) I think clear case, but whatever the polls say when I have my money, will be my new case mod![br][size=1]Posted on: February 15, 2007, 04:35:46 AM[/size][hr]The reason im Hardmodding and not Softmodding is because I have tried every softmodding tutorial that is on the web…(not really) but almost. None of them work for me, ever. And im not new to modding I know what im doin, its just something wrong with my Xbox (since its first line model) But the modchip should fix that!
[/quote]
Cool. Me Personaly is a PS-Fanboy.

Ive got a Ps1,Ps2,PsP
and now that there releasing Ps3, guess what!

FUCK THEM
I aint payin’ $999.95 bucks for a Special “Drive” thats gives better graphics for plasma users.

I Got myself a Wii :)[/quote]

bluray > *

Read full topic
